customer_addr:
29905 E Stone Rd
EL DORADO SPRINGS, MO 64744

citations.narrative:
* Rusted, broken, missing and bent enclosure wiring with sharp points were observed in two enclosures. Four dogs are
in contact with the affected wiring located in outdoor runs attached to sheltered housing. Sharp points may allow the
dogs to become injured. Rusty wire that has corrosion becomes weakened and may not be sound enough to maintain the
dogs in their enclosures. The licensee must ensure that housing facilities for dogs must be designed and constructed so
that they are structurally sound. They must be kept in good repair, and they must protect the animals from injury, contain
the animals securely, and restrict other animals from entering. Correct by 6/7/23.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.1(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
*   Rusted, broken, missing and bent enclosure wiring with sharp points were observed in two enclosures.  Four dogs are 
in contact with the affected wiring located in outdoor runs attached to sheltered housing.   Sharp points may allow the 
dogs to become injured. Rusty wire that has corrosion becomes weakened and may not be sound enough to maintain the 
dogs in their enclosures.   The licensee must ensure that housing facilities for dogs must be designed and constructed so 
that they are structurally sound. They must be kept in good repair, and they must protect the animals from injury, contain 
the animals securely, and restrict other animals from entering.  Correct by 6/7/23. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
